info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 8:12PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A thunderstorm producing heavy rainfall will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southwestern Washington and northwestern Rensselaer Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 809 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mechanicville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...This storm is producing locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding especially of low lying and poor drainage areas are possible. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Clifton Park, Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Ballston Spa, Round Lake, Country Knolls, North Ballston Spa, Rock City Falls, Gates, Halfmoon, Malta, Northumberland, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Deans Corners, Schaghticoke Hill and the Saratoga Performing Arts Center (SPAC). This includes Interstate 87 between exits 8A and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
